name: Features
content:
The following is a partial list of features provided by this system:

  • Assisted Skill, Ability, Spell, Invocation, Psionic, Injury, Healing, and Combat Rolls
  • Assisted Shock, Stumble, and Fumble Rolls
  • Assisted Attack, Defend, and Damage Rolls
  • Automated Combat (enhanced form of automated rolls)
  • Automatic Calculation of Skill Base from formula.
  • Automatic Calculation of Universal and Physical Penalties.
  • Skill Development Rolls (including specializations)
  • Missile Quantity Tracking
  • Weapon Quality and Breakage
  • Support for separate apparent (public) and biographical (private) descriptions.
  • Physical and Psyche Traits
  • Effects (limited duration or indefinite modifications to abilites and rolls, also known as "Buffs" and "Debuffs")
  • Shock Index Health Indicator
  • Output Spell, Invocation, or Psionics descriptions to chat
  • Filtering on Skills and Gear tabs
  • System Configuration Settings to control features
  • 300+ icons available for use with skills, weapons, spells, and other items.
  • Comprehensive Macros
  • Comprehensive Drag and Drop
  • Various compendiums of standard skills and gear.
  • Mounts and Steeds
  • Support for the Friends, Foes, and Followers V1 and Comprehensive Price Lists modules.
